Buena_Park.Anaheim Packing House: The Anaheim Packing House is a 42,000-square-foot (3,900 m2) gourmet food hall in Downtown Anaheim, in Anaheim, California, United States. Along with the Packard Building, a renovated 1925 Mission Revival style building, and a farmer's market, it makes up a shopping center called the Anaheim Packing District. The Packing House opened on May 31st, 2014 and is located in a renovated 1919 former Sunkist citrus packing house built in Spanish Colonial Revival style.
